text:
Menginap selama semalam dari 22 Januari 2023 sampai 23 Januari 2023. Memilih menginap di sini karena pesan secara dadakan. Walaupun terkesan asal pilih, rupanya cukup bagus.

Kamarnya tergolong lega meski berukuran kecil. Ukuran ranjang cukup pas. Matras cukup nyaman. Setiap ranjang diberikan guling. Soal tidur saya beri skor 9.

Di dalam kamar juga ada meja berukuran kecil dan dua lemari yang ramping. Lemari di sebelah meja untuk menggantung baju, sedangkan lemari sebelah meja memiliki tempat kosong untuk menyimpan barang. Satu tempat khusus untuk menyimpan jar dan teko listrik. Sangat membantu dalam menyimpan barang. Dalam hal kepraktisan saya beri skor 9.

Tipikal hotel Ibis, kamar mandi berukuran kecil. Sayang tisu diletakan pada area yang sulit dijangkau. Untuk kamar mandi saya beri skor 7.

Sama seperti di Ibis Style (Standar hotel Ibis sekarang seperti ini ya? Sebelumnya pernah menemui hal serupa di Ibis Style), air minum disediakan menggunakan dispenser di luar kamar. Sayang sekali, waktu itu saya mendapat jar dalam keadaan kotor. Akhirnya menggunakan air dari botol yang saya bawa.

Menu sarapan terbatas, normal untuk ukuran hotel budget. Meski terbatas, terdapat pilihan minuman yang cukup beragam mengandalkan minuman instan (Menggunakan merek Nestle). Rasanya biasa-biasa saja. Untuk sarapan saya beri skot 7.

Lokasi cukup strategis, dekat dengan halte Transjakarta, beragam penjual Nasi Kapau, McDonald's, dan Dunkin.
title: Kecil tapi Maksimal

kind regards

text:
Yup,,,here we are, akhirnya sempat juga mencoba menginap di hotel ini selama 2 malam! Tidak ada hal yg banyak diharapkan dari kelas hotel budget, termasuk yg satu ini, karena memang tujuan dibuatnya hotel ini hanyalah sebagai tempat singgah sementara, yaa minimal bisa memenuhi kebutuhan dasar manusia dengan manusiawi (istirahat, mandi, makan). 

1st ga tau kenapa...uda sering budget hotel, tp ini kamar terlihat kecil sekali, sepertinya karena efek pewarnaan yg agak gelap juga. Nilai plus juga, entertainment lewat TV kabel dan WIFI nya bagus dan bisa di andalkan. 

2nd Kamar mandi, ini kya berasa di dalam caravan. Entah apa yg dipikirkan manajemen hotel memberikan semacam "kamar mandi portable" di dalam kamar hotel yg menurut saya berkesan sangat sempit dan pengap. Keseluruhan lantai atap dan dinding terbuat dari fiber yg rawan pecah jika Anda tidak sengaja menjatuhkan benda keras, misal shower yg terbukti sepertinya sudah sering jatuh karena gagang nya sudah tidak berfungsi baik dan ada bekas tanda retakan kecil di lantai kamar mandi. Tapi yaa,, nice menambah pengalaman baru memasuki kamar mandi seperti itu. 

3rd Food!! Yep..ini yg selalu saya test ketika berkunjung ke suatu Hotel. Pesan makanan dari menu yg disediakan di kamar, dannnn... enak!! saya kasih nilai 9 / 10 untuk bakmi goreng jawa nya (must try lah!) sayangnya selama 2 hari menginap, saya belum sempat mencoba menu breakfast nya karena sudah diburu waktu keperluan lain. 

4th Untuk pelayanan staff so so lah, awal datang ada petugas security yg mengarahkan parkir kendaraan ke basement, cuma sayangkan pas kita keluar security kok kesan nya cuek2x aja ya? Tidak ada karcis parkir atau diarahkan dan di bantu sampai keluar jalanan. Ini salah satu yg bahaya dan rawan menurut saya, dan hari kedua menginap saya sampai pasang kunci pengaman khusus di kendaraan saya. Haha.. Untuk staff lain nya lumayan ramah, dari mulai receptionist sampai pengantar makanan pesaranan ke kamar, everything okey n' polite.

Overall utk kelas budget hotel, hotel ini sudah dapat memenuhi kebutuhan dasar manusia secara manusiawi. Maybe next time saya akan kembali lagi... Thanks IBIS!
title: Fine Budget hotel

text:
Kali kedua menginap di AccorHotels setelah Ibis Budget di Bandung, kali ini diperkenalkan booking melalui aplikasi di smartphone. Ternyata lebih banyak benefit plus rate lebih bersaing.

Lokasinya oke banget. Dekat dengan stasiun Senen, Atrium, atau halte TransJakarta Pal Putih. Mudah diakses kapan pun dan dari manapun.

Bangunan memang ga terlalu mencolok, tapi mudah ditemukan mengingat hotel Ibis memang ada nuansa khas tersendiri.

Saya senang sambutan dari staf FO, sangat ramah dan membantu. Meski sayang kalau dari keamanan, ga ada sambutan hangat atau sapaan ramah ke saya. Seperti dingin. Meski kalau ke tamu lain sih ramah hehehe.

Proses check in mudah dan cepat. Bahkan bisa memasuki kamar meski masih pukul 12.00 siang. Kamar pun disesuaikan dengan kondisi yang kita pesan.

Kondisi kamar, well, ga luas tapi nyaman sih. Sayang kesan "lama" masih terasa karena hotel ini memang sudah 3 tahun lebih sih. Padahal perabotan di kamar sih ga ada yang kuno ya hehehe. Entah juga kenapa.

Kalau fasilitas sih sudah oke. Ada teko pemanas air, TV channel yang oke, internet berjalan baik, bantal tambahan, guling, sampai ada Quran dan sajadah.

Kamar mandinya capsule ya? Minimalis tapi apik. Pembatas area showernya ada, sayangnya saat saya staycation debit airnya kurang deras. Katanya sih ada pengecekan.

Satu hal lain yang saya senangi, menu breakfast yang beragam. Apalagi sudah bisa tersaji dari pukul 4 pagi. Kopinya banyak pilihan juga.

Untuk rate 400ribuan, Ibis Senen sih sudah oke. Lokasinya enak, kamarnya cukup nyaman, hanya memang beberapa catatan pribadi yang saya tulis di atas semoga bisa jadi masukan.

Ulasan hotel ini juga saya tulis di akun IG @hotelopedia, bila berkenan bisa dilihat juga.

Salam.
title: Sesuai Rate-nya

text:
+ Check In cepat, lokasi Ok. & semua ditutupi dengan pelayanan/akomodasi buruk, sbb :
1. Pesan 2 kamar family room 3 bed. Tp handuk hanya di kasih 2. Harus minta lagi
2. Wi Fi lemooottttt
3. Kamar 619 AC tidak dingin
4. Sengaja titip kunci sekitar jam 9 pagi di resepsionis dan minta make up room. HASILNYA balik ke kamar jam 13.30, kedua kamar TIDAK DIRAPIHKAN !!!! Kita yang sengaja balik ke hotel cepat agar bisa istirahat harus keluar lagi menunggu ruangan dibersihkan Dan stlh dirapihkan, handuk pun tidak di ganti. Harus minta lagi. 
5. Variasi dan rasa makanan kurang memuaskan, masih lbh unggul F*v* hotel. 

Saya menginap 2 malam tanggal 01-03 Jan 17. 

Gak lagi lagi balik ke hotel ini !!!
title: HOTEL YANG SANGAT ME NGE CE WA KAN!!!

owner_response.text:
Bapak Beben0505 yang terhormat ,

Terima kasih Anda telah meluangkan waktu untuk membagi umpan balik Anda. Sementara saya berharap bahwa Anda memiliki pengalaman yang lebih baik di kunjungan Anda kemarin, dari umpan balik seperti inilah kami belajar dan ini akan kami gunakan untuk memperbaiki diri khususnya untuk ketersediaan handuk dalam kamar , dan suhu AC dalam kamar kapasitas 3 orang bisa di set up hingga 16 drajat Celsius. 
kami mulai make up room mulai pukul 9 pagi hingga 5 sore untuk seluruh kamar. dan kami menerapkan program penggantian handuk jika diletakan di lantai seperti himbauan yang tertera di bathroom tentang ramah lingkungan  , sedangkan layanan breakfast ,kami awali dengan early riser jam 4 - 6 pagi , full buffet breakfast jam 6 - 10 pagi dan late riser jam 10-12 siang , dan wifi kami sediakan hingga penggunaan 3 device dalam 1 kamar. 
Kami bekerja keras untuk memberikan pengalaman tamu yang luar biasa, dan dalam hal ini jelas bahwa kami belum melakukan yang anda harapkan . 
Jika Anda memberi kami kesempatan untuk mendapatkan kepercayaan Anda kembali, saya akan meyakinkan Anda bahwa kami akan melakukan yang terbaik untuk memberikan Anda pengalaman hotel yang baik seperti banyak tamu kami yang tumbuh menyukai pengalaman mereka yang baik di hotel ini.

Hormat Saya ,

Andri Kurniawan
Operations Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Hotel Ibis Jakarta Senen merupakan hotel yang sangat nyaman dan terpenting adalah kebersihannya sangat terjaga, kebutuhan yang mendasar bagi seorang tamu telah disediakan oleh pihak hotel. Lokasinya sangat strategis di pusat kota sehingga mau kemana saja sangat mudah apalagi dekat dengan stasiun kereta. Pelayanannya pun sangat baik dan ramah, keperluan yang saya inginkan dapat dipenuhi dengan cepat oleh pihak hotel.
title: Hotel yang sangat nyaman

text:
Saya sudah sering sekali menginap di hotel ini, pertama karena letaknya sangat dekat dengan tempat penugasan sehingga hanya membutuhkan waktu 5-10 menit saja ketempat yang dituju. Pertama kali menginap adalah saat bulan puasa. Saya biasa mengambil paket room only tanpa sarapan jadi belum merasakan kualitas makanan di ibis Senen.

Parkir tempatnya tidak terlalu banyak, akses menuju basement hanya cukup satu mobil sehingga harus berhati-hati. Dikamar tersedia hair dryer dan ammeneties standar hotel. Air hangat juga tersedia dengan baik sepanjang waktu. Wifi gratis dapat dinikmati di hotel dengan cukup baik. Yang menarik adalah waktu saya menginap saat puasa disediakan sajadah dan alquran di kamar. Sangat personal dan menyentuh buat saya yang muslim dan saat itu sedang puasa. Lain waktu saya menginap bukan lagi di bulan puasa, saya pikir tidak ada lagi sajadah dan alquran tapi ternyata saya salah karena masih ada hingga saat ini. Menurut pihak hotel sudah menjadi standar dihotel ibis Senen. Ini yang membuat saya makin cinta dengan ibis Senen.
title: Tidak Pernah Kecewa Sering Menginap Disini

text:
Saya sudah beberapa kali menginap di Ibis Senin karena dekat dengan lokasi tugas saya selama di Jakarta. Kali ini benar-benar mengecewakan. Dimulai dari saat saya check in yang harus menunggu lama, dan setelah masuk ke kamar ternyata bau rokok, padahal setau saya di lingkungan Ibis/Accor sudah menerapkan no smoking policy. Kemudian saat berikutnya saya mau masuk kamar ternyata kartunya tidak bisa digunakan sehingga saya harus ke lobi untuk diperbaiki sistem di kartunya, namun tetap tidak bisa. Hal itu terjadi beberapa kali. 
Pelayanan Ibis Senin dari waktu ke waktu semakin menurun, harap dipertimbangkan oleh manajemennya.

text: Tugas berangkat keluar daerah merupakan saat-saat yang ditunggu-tunggu oleh sebagian besar pegawai yang berada di daerah. Apalagi tujuannya adalah Ibu Kota Jakarta..Mendengar rencana untuk ditugaskan ke Jakarta, alangkah senangnya dan secara tidak langsung timbul angan-angan atau ke bayang akan keindahan dan kenikmatan yang akan saya dapatkan. Apa lagi kami rencana akan di inapkan di hotel. Dengan tidak lupa saya udah mempersiapkan semua kebutuhan saya untuk di Jakarta nanti. Hari demi hari sampai juga waktu untuk berangkat dan akhirnya sampailah kami di Jakarta. Dengan di jemput oleh sopir pool kami dan kami di inapkan di hotel Ibis. Seperti biasanya kami udah di ceking an kamar dan dengan buru-buru saya membakar rokok setelah 3 jam 20 waktu perjalanan di pesawat ditambah 1 jam lebih perjalanan ke hotel, kebiasaan saya yang tergolong perokok berat, baru beberapa detik saya menikmati rokok yang saya bakar, dengan sopan petugas hotel menegur saya bahwa di hotel sini tidak boleh merokok. Waduh seketika itu pula saya merasa tidak nyaman untuk berada di dalam hotel. Setelah selesai saya merokok di luar lobby hotel, saya masuk ke dalam hotel dan menanyakan resepsionis tempat untuk merokok dan menanyakan adakah kamar yang bisa merokok di dalam kamar, jawabannya tidak ada kamar bebas merokok, semakin tersiksalah saya berada di dalam kamar hotel tersebut, hingga saya harus keluar dari kamar dan turun untuk mencari daerah merokok. Keesokan harinya daripada menyiksa Kebiasaanku, terpaksa saya pindah ke hotel lain yang ada kamar bisa untuk merokok. Daripada saya tinggal di kamar walaupun penuh dengan fasilitas tapi tidak dapat merokok dalam kamar adalah penyiksaan yang tidak dapat saya terima. Itulah nasib perokok berat.
title: Hotel yang Sangat Menyiksa Kebiasaanku

text:
Menginap disini semalam setelah pindah dari Ibis Harmoni karena tidak puas dengan ibis Harmoni. Resepsionis ramah seperti biasa, begitu juga dengan staf di restaurant. Sayangnya makanan saat sarapan pagi sudah tidak menarik seperti dulu, tidak ada salad bar (mudah-mudahan hanya kebetulan tidak ada saat saya kemarin menginap disana).
Satu hal yang agak mengecewakan adalah saat saya menelpon resepsionis untuk meminta shaver... setelah menunggu selama 1 jam, saya telpon lagi ke resepsionis... dan sepertinya tidak ada koordinasi karena resepsionis yang kedua ini tidak tahu kalau sebelumnya saya sudah minta shaver. Setelah menunggu sekitar 20 menit lagi dan belum diantarkan, saya menelpon lagi, dan menurut si resepsionis sudah diantar. Setelah saya bersikeras belum diantar, akhirnya petugasnya datang mengantarkan shaver. Sangat disayangkan saya harus menunggu sekitar 1,5 jam
title: Sarapan pagi tidak seenak seperti biasanya

text:
dari beberapa hotel jaringan IBIS yang pernah saya booked bahkan saya mereview beberapa diantaranya, baru di IBIS Jakarta Senen ini saya mendapatkan pengalaman yang menurut saya tidak lazim di antara ibis lain, yaitu:

1. saat itu saya melalukan booked on site ( lebih sering sih online ), saat mau masuk di depan terpampang room rate yang sekitar 400 rb sekian ( mendekati 500 rb) , lalu sampai di front office disebutkan rate kamar 500 rb sekian ( mendekati 600 rb ), males debat ya nrimo ( saat check out sempet mengutarakan ingin bertemu manager, namun sayang di sayang katanya belum datang, dan biar nga mati penasaran nanya sama front office dan di jawab harga di dpn not included tax 21 % ) ok karena saya orang yang taat membayar pajak dan mengerti bahwa hasil dari pajak adalah pembangunan dan kemajuan masyrakat Indonesia termasuk masyarakat DKI menerima dengan hati gembira...padahl mah...hhhmmm rela donks.. namun ada baik nya sih biar orang nga salah paham langsung aja pajang rate yang sudah incliude tax 21% itu, seperti jauh lebih fair.

2. Ini sumpah bener ...baru kali ini saya mau nginep di IBIS dikasih harga partial...alias room only not included breakfast..( mungkin sang receptionist melihat kami saya sama istri looh hanya ingin yah...sensor lah kata2 nya ya...) hal ini memungkin kan saja, sebab saat itu memang penampilan saya kucel...soal nya dari arah kelapgading naik motor jemput istri yang dateng dari joga di stasiun gambir.

3. partial berikut nya ...saat saya bilang saya mau includ breakfast di jawab sopan sih..boleh pak di tambah Rp. 85.000 , nasib2 nambah lagi saya jawab ya gpp, seh si mbak ngelanjutin partial berikut nya...breakfast nya untuk 1 org...astaga....ibis oh ibis ...kenapa begitu sih..sumpah baru kali ini saya di perlakukan ( tadinya mau tulis dianiaya biar dramatis ) seperti ini, oh iya kembali saya teringat penampilan saya yang kucel....positive thinking lagi...sehingga akhir nya saya harus mengeluarkan dan sebesar 710 rb yang sebenernya kan nga perlu ribet...bilang aja dari awal pak harga room 710 rb disokin included breakfast....kan cepet...kalo si kucel kaga cukup dana nya kan pasti mundur teratur.....

3. room saya 308, saat masuk jujur kamar nya nga sesuai dengan harga 710 rb tadi..pendapat saya nga bersih (jelasin nya agak bingung sih,cuma ya gambaran diantar kamar bersih dengan kumuh ,ya di tengah2 lah ).

4. sabun dan shampo kurang di perhatikan isinya kosoooonnngg...saat diisi eh pas di pencet sabun shampo nya seperti nga niat mau keluar.

ya semua hal diatas saya harap bisa menjadi masukkan untuk memperbaiki kwalitas hotel ibis jakarta senen, semoga bisa menyenangkan di depan nya.

salam

rei...

text:
I've stayed in Ibis Jakarta Senen from Oct 6th to Oct 15th 2018 for business reason.

My room number was 510 and when I proceed to check out and going to claim my Accor Points for my stay, the receptionist told me that I can not earn points because I was staying in corporate rate. That was very unfortunate for me because what I read in the term and condition from my Accor Hotels App, it says: "Contract corporate rates allow points to be earned whatever the means used to book."

Accor Hotels has been my priority for both my business and leisure trip since 2010. Even when I was in New York City, I chose to stay at Novotel Times Square.

Even though I've just interested to become a loyalty member for Accor Hotels from the last few days, my first experience as an Accor Hotel member was quite unpleasant.

text:
Room - 3/5
Washroom - 1/5
Service - 4/5
Breakfast - 4/5
Location - 4/5

The location of the hotel is good, and you can get a taxi from the street. Some good malls are closeby. The rooms are small, and doesnt have a refrigerator. But they are clean, and housekeeping would clean the room everyday. The washroom was very small, the shower wasnt great (it was either very hot or icy cold, no normal). 

The service was good, and the staff helpful. They tried to answer our questions about nearby attractions. The morning breakfast was also good, though not many vegetarian dishes. 

The hotel gave free wifi, which could be used in 2 devices.

text: The room inside this complex is standard as the IBIS hotel that I stayed in overseas.  The check-in is seamless and efficient, breakfast is pretty good (all inclusive).  The only downer is that a huge complex is being built next door right at this moment.  If you were to be a light sleeper and that you sleep late, and this may not be the ideal hotel for you right now.  Unfortunately, the room that I stayed in was infested with ants.  They were already there before me, and this being a tropical country, this is to be expected.  I'm not too fussed about it but, I'm just saying....By the way, the power point at the hotel room here is being placed at awkward places.  Apparently, not much thought is being put into where the power points were supposed to be.  Ideal for a short stay.  Commendable stay.  Despite that WiFi is being provided free, it's sporadic to say the least.  There are certain improvements that I believe should happen to bring it to the next level.
title: Standard IBIS

text:
I was checked in by my company as I had to conduct training for 5 days - from 16 March to 20 March 2015. My stay was very pleasant - everything was clean and I really like their 15 minutes policy - meaning they will attend to any enquiries / needs etc in less than 15 minutes and they have honoured that policy! This is a very 'business' hotel - so no frills, etc which I don't mind. Every staff was very polite and helpful - so that was a great highlight. I wish the hotel comes equipped with a little gym though and a hair / beauty place for ladies (and gents) who are on business and who need perhaps a basic shampoo and blow dry and perhaps more treatment! 
Also, I don't know why they are serving Nescafe instant coffee! Indonesia has got so many kinds of absolutely delicious coffee from Java and Sumatra! Why serve INSTANT coffee?? The coffee was a real turn-off! The food was okay - lunch especially was quite well-done (all our trainees got free lunch), breakfast was not too bad and dinner was a la carte - no big wows about the food, but that's fine.
It's location is very central and it's very easy to get taxis. 
So other than the food and the lack of certain amenities (which are beyond the staff's control) - it was a very pleasant stay at Ibis Senen - especially for business purposes. The free wifi especially was very helpful!
title: Training at Ibis Senen

text:
Not as big as the one in Slipi... I booked the room via internet (either booking.com or Agoda.com... can't remember)... And I think that was where the problem comes from... It was 7pm in the afternoon on my exhausting day and it took me about 2 hours waiting in the hotel lobby (where people accross here and there since it is the main entrance I would say..) because the receptionist had to confirm with the internet and so on and so on... And  need to ask about 3 or 4 times to the receptionist desk whether they had had finished the stuff and I could get the room before I finally get the room... So I entered the room given..and was so surprised... I got a smoking room... :((
I clearly remembered ordering the non-smoking room plus I noted on my booking receipe note that I need a non-smoking room/floor in regard to medical issue... So, once again I had to deal with the receptionist staff before finally I could get the room I preferred at almost 10 to 11 pm.... What a messy evening...

I think my room was the smallest in it's rate... But I was OK with that... The bath room is quite okay..but need more attention on the cleaning (saw some stains over the toilet and a foul smelling I had no idea comes from where)... However, I liked that it provided me hair dryer..thanks.
Staff were friendly... Breakfast was fine.. They had dragonfruit smoothies in room service which taste nice...

If you have bussiness at UI Salemba, then you need to go away the direction first and then find the U-turn near Kwitang street then go back to the opposite direction toward UI Salemba... Traffic jam is crazy in the morning so even though looks like they're close, I prefer leaving hotel at about 1 hour before the due time.
title: (Almost) average... (sorry)

text:
We stayed at the Ibis Jakarta Senen in November 2014. We absolutely Loved It & Will Be returning. The indoor and outdoor area looks clean. There is a small garden beside restaurant, somekind of waterfall. 
The rooms were spacious and clean as well as the public areas. Service was prompt and courteous. There is a small supermarket walking around 10 min to the trafficlight. away if you decide to grill or pick up snacks. 
If you have a room off the highway it's noisy. We did have a room off the highway and you could hear traffic, but it wasn't very loud at all, and it didn't interrupt our sleep. Not Jakarta if it's without traffic, crowds and noise. It's a great place. I recommend ibis Jakarta Senen. Our next trip to Jakarta will be at ibis jakarta senen.
title: Good for ibis

I stay at this hotel because i've a meeting near the hotel.
After survey some hotel, i choose this hotel because :
1. This a brand new hotel
2. The location near my meeting place
3. The price is good.

This hotel staff is polite and nice. Since i bring my car, they let me park my car just in front of the lobby hotel, so we just walk for several meter to the lobby.

We have a quick check in, and i ask them to give the room facing to the Monas, because i wonder if the room face the road, they will be a little noisy (because the road is a busy road).

The room is small, but clean. They don't have any mini bar or referigerator. But the most is the bathroom, very small... but once again.. clean.

I don't try the breakfast. 
So, i think this is a good hotel, value to the money.

text:
Stayed in workdays for emergency overnight work with very affordable rate around IDR260k before tax

Parking was easy, check in was fast, and my room has already been prepared prior to my arrival (2 cards given to me at check in, 1 card already in the room for air conditioning)

Everyone in the hotel was very welcoming and helpful with my add on request. 

Room was incredibly comfy and clean. Plastic mineral water were not provided in exchange for refillable water from their in floor dispenser and tasted clean (its accor no plastic policy which i liked). 

Housekeeping also prepare a towel art in my room (i think it is love shaped haha), thank you :)

I am platinum member and i got my free breakfast and welcome drinks (can be exchanged for fresh juices which indeed tasted fresh). I also got late check out at astounding 5 PM which is hard to find since most capped at 3 or 4 PM

No room upgrade for member since this ibis, along with most ibis indonesia, only have one room type (completely understandable)

No welcome ammenities since accor policy also doesnt require ibis brand to provided such benefit, amidst i receive some in other ibis hotel (but that is due to their own policy, and some who do have much higher price point.

Also very tiny details i dont like (not a deal breaker obviously) is they dont place their wall charger directly besides the bed which kinda impractical :(

Other than that this hotel is perfect for an ibis, hope i could come again :)
title: Great Hotel, Great Member Benefits, incredibly Low Price

I felt the room was comfortable, hot water was good, the bed and pillow was also good to help me sleep.
Although there were some limitations and restrictions but the service was still impressive.

text:
Ibis Hotel Senen is one of the most extraordinary hotel I've ever stayed! They picked me up and I stayed here a good 8 days 7 night, and the food was so yummy. They have exercise hour (7am to 9am) every morning and the guests love it. The staff is also very kind and caring to me and the other guests. You ask for it.. they get it for you! I also made new friends during my quarantine stay which was really lovely! Their wifi is really fast and I had no problem with it at all. The TV had standard channels and I very much enjoyed my stay at Ibis Hotel and would love to come again sometime in the future. They have mini hospital to ensure that you get the best medical attention when needed. Also, free laundry everyday! I thought this was really nice and I feel so relaxed and happy!

To all the staff, thank you for taking care of me during my stay. I will surely come back again after the pandemic is over!
title: Lovely hotel, kind staff and excellent services!

text: I would call this Ibis hotel a "minimalist Ibis" for its affordable price and relatively smaller room dimension than most Ibis. The price is lower than most other Ibis. Commensurate with that, guests get smaller room and less TV channels, but other than that the overall experience is satisfying. However I would like to point out the unevenness in shower condition. I frequently stay at Ibis Senen so that I can compare rooms. On the top of my list is the shower. Most shower facility is okay but in Room 921 the faucet can not stand on its own, in Room 706 the water pressure is low, both make taking shower harder for guests.
title: Clean Affordable Comfortable but Uneven Shower Condition

text: I booked 2 rooms for my family and stayed in this hotel last weekend because of family emergency matter. The hotel is just like another budget hotels. The room and bathroom size is decent. With the room rate I paid, I could not expect too much. The air conditioner was hot in one of our rooms when we got in the room after checking in and we had to call engineering staff to come and check the AC. He ended up vacuuming the AC pipe inside the ceiling, and it's our bed time already. The next morning I asked the housekeeping if they can send an iron and iron board to my room. I had to wait for 45 minutes and nobody showed up, and I had to call them again to remind them. The housekeeping staff finally came to my room and deliver the iron and iron board in extremely poor condition in which I never saw such a poor iron board condition in a hotel room before in my whole life or even in my own house! The iron board cover was torn, with burnt marks here and there, and 2 tips of iron board legs were missing and made it unbalanced while using. I could see that it was a very cheap iron board with a poor quality and was surprised that an Ibis Hotel would want to provide their guests with that kind of extremely poor quality and cheap equipment. I attached 3 photos of the iron board here that you can see. The iron itself has a torn wire which is not safe at all to be used. Amazing !!! I didn't submit my complain to the staff at that time as I was in a hurry and had to attend a family member funeral in that morning. Well, my suggestion for this hotel is : please consider replacing your iron board and iron and throw the current ones to the garbage bin. With your room rate of 1 night, you can buy a good quality and safe iron board .. and another 1 night room rate can be used to buy a new and good quality iron.
title: Average hotel with extremely poor quality of iron and iron board

text: I was part of a trade mission of Philippine government and business persons to Jakarta and one of the recommended hotels was Ibis Jakarta Senen because of its proximity to the Indonesian Ministry of Trade. It was my first time to stay in an Ibis hotel. It was a tiring trip from Manila and we arrived at the hotel at about 4am, sleepy and hungry and eager to get the check in procedures over and done with. The hotel front office staff, deluged with so many arriving guests at such an unholy hours, was able to fix everything up all by himself. Kudos to him (I believe his name was Sukmono). The room was quite small but efficient with soft bed, coffee urn, bottled water but there was no minibar. What got my attention was the modular T&B similar to the one in the cruise ships.
title: Ibis Jakarta trip1

text:
That is the three-point points for this hotel. The "O.M.G" points are location. I have to walk 40 minutes return just to buy a toothbrush at the nearby convenient store. It's ok when there's no water falling down from the sky with extra wind, but during  heavy rain it's not okay. And the other things that annoying is the noises from the next building. Dear lord, only God and the rest of the crowd knows what is exactly going on that night. 

The room quite small, but the bed are heavenly comfortable. An extra pillow and bolster really helpful for maximum sleeping quality. I really like the curvy bathroom, and all the sign that Ibis Senen supporting sustainable and responsible tourism in Indonesia. Good job! I think it's going much better if you don't use the bottled mineral water.

Ibis Senen also offers good variety of breakfast, and beverages. All the good quality products. At least really helpful for those who always craving for a nice coffee after bad hangover. They are using Nescafe coffee machine for both hot and cold serve. Location quite good actually if you travelling with a vehicle, but if you like exploring the city by walking just prepare your self to get sweaty. 

I really want to give a 5 star but since 2 incident happens to me, I'll go with 4 star then.
title: Bathroom, Bolster, and Breakfast.

text:
I arrived in this hotel at 5am in a really exhausted situation and plead in case the hotel can arrange an early check in for me. The receptionist named Baim said room was available as someone has checked out but will need time for cleaning up so i assume early check in was okay so i wait in the lobby. I asked several times for the room availability but the guy kept on saying that it was not ready yet. Until 7am i asked again then he said the cleaning service will start working at 8.30am! At this point i already wasted 4 hours of my time.

It was 9am when i asked again  and his answer is that early check in will be available at 12 and the hotel will charge 50% from the publish rate! Which he never mentioned about it before. And at 12? Come on is your guest's time is so invaluable for you? In case so you can inform me in the beginning and i will find other place to rest until check in time.

The receptionist guy also didn't apologise at all. Worst hotel experience.
title: Really horrible! Misleading staff.

text:
I want to start off by saying, that I have to admit, that Jakarta is definetly not a tourist location (unless I didnt see what exactly I am supposed to visit besides MONAS), but I was out for business so...

My stay at Ibis was quite uneventful, though I would like to give a small review as to how it went.

First of all staff are exceptionally nice and friendly people, they sure know their thing, when it comes to hospitality. I think the only downside to the staff employed at the location is their lack of english language practise. I think thats something they can work on.

A small downside is if you dont speak english, sometimes taxi drivers have really hard time finding location, or they will pretend like they dont know where it is (to run the meter). Either way the location is quite convenient considering the bank, a smoke vendor (for a smoker like myself) a small travel agency (should you travel around Indonesia) nearby. The staff is always prompt on getting a cab for me.

Rather than that, rooms were exceptionally clean, the sheets and towels were changed every day which was a pleasant surprise for 3 and a half star hotel. Only small issue I encountered (which really didnt bother me, since I didnt eat in the room etc), was one of the days I killed a small german roach (about half an inch) that was on my table. That by no means judges about the cleanliness of the place (which was exceptional), but speaks volumes about overall pests situation in Jakarta as well as the fact, that you are likely to encounter a pest or two in tropical climate.

I warned the management and the issue was dealt with immideately. The pest control has been provided as well as thousands of appologies (which was more than enough). Still have to mention it since some people may have allergies or may not be as understading of tropical climate/environment etc as I was.

The food downstairs was really decent, but a bit pricy. I would not eat lunch buffet again, since there were way too many deep-friend choices (sort of a Indonesian cuisine thing) as well as tastes were a bit bland.

The evening buffet, however, was exceptional, but still a bit pricy at around 200k IDR for it+drink(cola), which is what I could get a decent steak and a glass of wine with. 

Other entrees on the menu (I tried several) were few and far in between taste wise. If I had to rate 1-10, some dishes were right at 10 others at 1. 

Being an italian, I can tell you they definetly have to work on their pizza and alfredo sauce. I enjoyed the pasta alfredo first time around, when I ordered it, however on day of my departute, it was absolutely disgusting and became a headache (stomachache) for me on my 29 hour flight/airport wait.

The lounge/restaraunt offers no alcohol, which in my opinion was a big downfall.

All and all, Ibis Senen offers exactly what you need if you are in there for either budget tourism or business trip: clean minimalistic room, friendly staff (that is willing to accomodate you) and reasonable prices for all that.

I am definitely coming back.
title: Spent 8 days in this hotel

text:
This new Ibis hotel in Jakarta is great value for money in the heaving metropolis that is Jakarta. 

It is a typical Ibis hotel with the usual plastic, Ikea-like boxy feel to it, but it is clean, the beds are comfortable, hot water (in a pod-like bathroom) and the wi-fi is super fast. The breakfast (and dinner) is nothing to write home about, but the overall hotel service is quick, friendly and efficient. 

On the downside, the location is one to think about. It is right on one of the busiest thoroughfares of Jakarta, and it does overlook nearby local decrepit houses. Not one of the most attractive neighbourhoods that's for sure. Nearby food options are limited, but Plaza Atrium is only a 15 minute walk away. The walls are relatively thin so you can also hear the TV and conversation from the neighbouring room.

Overall, if it is close to where you need to be then it is great value for money but it does have its limitations.
title: Good value for money

text:
Like other Ibis Hotel around the world, I didn't expect to have big room what so ever. But this is a new hotel and it was really nice to stay in a brand new hotel.  Everything was fresh and it felt like I was the first person who use each facility they have.  

The furniture in the room was considered very OK with nice matching color with the rest of the interior of light brown, orange, and red; colors of Ibis.  The bath room (or should I say the wash room plus small shower booth) was very small.  I can not imagine how the huge size person will fit in the room.  Thankfully I am a slip person so I just fit nicely.  When I say booth, it is a booth, just like a phone booth.  When you want to take shower, you enter the fiberglass booth at the size of the phone booth as like you wanted to make a phone call :).  It was nice though, I can not say it wasn't, and it is Ibis hotel... what do you expect?

But the two thumbs up was the breakfast.  I was not expecting that nice, but it was exceeded my expectation. For the 3-star hotel, the breakfast was overwhelmed!  Good decision, really, for the management to set such nice breakfast.
title: New hotel, good breakfast

text:
Stayed from Dec 12- 15,2013. The online reservation was easy and straight-forward. There were delays with email correspondence on inquiry and request but I did managed to call the hotel directly to put up my request.
Checked in was smooth and fast despite not being able to get our chosen bed type room. *Advice:Staff needs to read the reservation documents in detail to understand guest request and type of rooms.

Rooms: Very nice with simple basic room amenities. Had to request for new towels as we tend to have stain towel after room make-up services. Spacious for Ibis hotel.

Dining: The breakfast was a bit limited but we enjoyed it anyway. Had the dinner buffet on our first night as we were too tired to go out after check-in. The food were nice, not very fantastic but it was definitely worth the money. *Please check on your reservation packages, I was supposed to get a dining voucher for every room but was told by the front desk its was a lucky draw prize advertisement. Hotel staff and supervisor should be knowledgeable of the APAC Accor hotel promotion and privileges. Anyway, I didn't want to make a fuss since its just a voucher.

Going Around: There isn't much places to go around the hotel, except the nearest Mall (Atrium if I'm not wrong. Around 15 mins walk) I've chartered a 10-seater bus from blue bird Taxi service before my departure. I would strong recommend Blue Bird to all tourist. They are efficient, friendly and knowledgeable about places. *URL: http://www.bluebirdgroup.com/
Our "Big Bird" driver, Syaiful, was very friendly and super-nice. We were stranded in the middle of the road at midnight as one of the tyre punctured. Within 45 mins, the replacement van came and Syaiful personally drove us back to the hotel. It was a good travelling experience for all of us even though there were hiccups and traffic jams. 

Overall: Ibis Jakarta Senen is very affordable, clean, friendly staff, especially the security guards at the hotel entrance. They were so helpful. Will definitely consider staying here again if I'm back in Jakarta.
title: Comfortable Decent Hotel

text:
For my trip to Banjarmasin, i had to do a quick stop in Jakarta in order to get a local flight. So i stayed in Ibis Senen for a night and turned out delightfully well. 
Since i had to fly in after work on a Friday, the team was thoughtful enough to wait for my arrival at 10pm. My room as amply cooled and lit--waiting for me. The front staff was swift for the check in. I was in my room in no time. I ordered in food from the kitchen--quite good also.
The next day, i had the hotel breakfast. Delightfully, the GM himself Mr Edward Setiady extended his warm welcome personally, while i had my breakfast. The breakfast fare was simplistic, but cordial and complete.
And since i had to run to my flight that morning, the check-out staff was equally swift and helpful in getting me a good cab. Overall, it was a good overnight experience, and i look forward to visit Ibis Senen soon.
title: Restful spot in the middle of the bustles

text: This newcomer is the 6th Ibis hotel in Jakarta, very new and fresh. Typical Ibis style and bright room. This hotel is located at the area called Senen, a very busy yet not pretty safe area because it is not too far from Senen Central Market and the train station of Senen. It is always crowded with traffic jam most of the time. Not near to everywhere except you are having some business in that area. The Transjakarta busway was in front the hotel, you can take that bus to Ancol, the seaside area at North Jakarta,but always be careful with the crowded bus which must have a lot of pickpockets as this area is a bit slum area. Not too much tourist attraction in this area. Tugu Monas and Gambir Train Station is about 10 minutes by taxi and beware of traffic jam. The lobby is fresh and not big, they serve good breakfast. As all the rooms are not facing the main road called Jalan Kramat Raya, then the noise can be minimized. The hotel is still very new and not all taxi drivers know the location. Be aware that there is another Ibis hotel by, the name is Ibis Kemayoran at Bungur. A lot of taxi driver will mistaken while bringing you to Ibis. To make thing simple,just tell the taxi driver Ibis Senen at Kramat Raya near STIE YAI (a college for economic study). Room is typical Ibis, clean, with wood flooring. The room has tea and coffee maker, flat screen TV and two bottle of fresh water. The water power at shower is not strong. Parking space is adequate as this hotel has underground parking. Finding taxi is not difficult because this area is a business area and the big road of Kramat Raya is always busy. Overall, this is not a tourist hotel due to the location, but if you are having business around Senen area, then this is the best choice.
title: Good Ibis,but problem with the location

text:
J'avais réservé cet Ibis pour son coté "bon marché", j'ai été déçu, surtout par son emplacement vraiment peu pratique, rien au alentour, le quartier n'est vraiment pas agréable, il faut un transport à chaque sortie, je n'y reviendrai pas.
Le secteur du magasin Sarinah est bien mieux et de loin !

Ma chambre des plus classiques n'était tout de même pas très grande mais calme propre rien à redire, salle de bain mieux approvisionnée en consommables qu'habituellement chez Ibis, nécessaire à café, par contre pas de frigo, la wifi également très mauvaise, obligé de faire modem avec son portable, le coffre à ras le sol obligeait à de la gymnastique...Pas de piscine.

Buffet petit déjeuner inclus mais très indonésien, un seul plat chaud occidental, quelques viennoiseries mais à minima...

Sinon personnel très agréable et poli.
title: Pas pratique pour les touristes...

text:
L'ibis Senen a ouvert ses portes en juillet 2013. Nous y avons séjourné 2 nuits.
Il est situé dans le centre ville de Jakarta, à 10 min en tuktuk de la gare de Gambir (30min à pieds) et à 15 min du "Golden Triangle". Le quartier de l'hôtel n'est pas génial mais on trouve des taksi ou des tuktuk devant facilement.
Le personnel est accueillant et souriant. Nous avions un soucis avec la réservation de notre chambre mais le personnel de réception a su trouver une solution rapidement, notre chambre a été préparée pendant notre dîner au restaurant.
Le hall et le restaurant sont bien décorés. Les ascenseurs sont rapides.
La chambre est une chambre ibis dernière génération avec parquet, bureau, TV écran plat (avec HBO). Le lit est très propre (neuf) et confortable. Points positifs : le plateau de courtoisie avec bouteilles d'eau, café et thé, et le coffre-fort. Attention, il n'y a que 2 prises électriques (1 asiatique sur le bureau et 1 européenne sous le bureau). Le wifi fonctionne très bien dans tout l'hôtel.
La salle d'eau est pratique (type préfabriqué ibis arrondi). Points négatifs : il manquait une serviette et du papier toilette le deuxième jour.
Niveau restauration, nous n'avons pas pris le petit-déjeuner, mais le dîner était bon et servi par un personnel toujours souriant. Point négatif : le manque de choix à la carte, nous avons mangé ce qu'il restait (l'hôtel venant d'ouvrir j'espère qu'une nouvelle carte plus élaborée est en cours de développement...)
C'est donc un bon hôtel qui, malgré son ouverture récente, est composé d'équipements opérationnels et d'une équipe disponible et professionnelle.
title: Nouvel hôtel
